sourcesContent:
import { Button, Grid, GridItem } from '@chakra-ui/react' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function ContentFooter() { //all items const items = useSelector((state)=>state.todos.items) console.log("items:",items) //kaç yapılmamış kaldı const itemsLeft = items.filter((item)=>!item.completed).length; console.log("itemsLeft:",itemsLeft) return ( 2 items left ALL Active Completed ) } export default ContentFooter /*
2 items left

  • all

  • Active

  • Completed

*/
